sources.title: 1960 - Seven Thieves - Siete ladrones - Henry Hathaway - VE - Versión en Español
1960 - Seven Thieves - Siete ladrones - Henry Hathaway - VO - Versión Original
Seven Thieves (1960) Edward G. Robinson · Rod Steiger
sources.description: A group of professional crooks, led by their intelligent leader, robs the Monaco casino. A sedate but charming genre entertainment that relies primarily on its seasoned actors.

metadata.Plot: In Monte Carlo, Theo Wilkins (Edward G. Robinson) recruits his young protégé Paul Mason (Rod Steiger), just released from prison, to help him rob the famous casino of four million dollars. The plan is straightforward. On the night of the Governor's Ball, Theo will create a distraction in the casino by having one of the team collapse requiring urgent medical attention. During that time, Paul and another member of the crew will get the money from the vault. When the ambulance arrives, the money will leave with the sick man. The plan is a good one, but not everyone will survive the robbery, and no one will get rich from it.
metadata.Actors: Edward G. Robinson, Rod Steiger, Joan Collins
